title: True.Grit.2010.(1080p).BrRip.x265.(HEVC).DTS.5.1.mkv
description:
NOTE: H.265/High Efficiency Video Coding (HEVC) is a video compression standard, a successor to H.264/MPEG-4 AVC (Advanced Video Coding), which provides substantially improved video quality in terms of noise level, color spaces, and dynamic range at the same bit rate.

Use the latest nightly version of VLC or MPC-HC to play back!

If you want more info about HEVC, you can find it here:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_Efficiency_Video_Coding" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_Efficiency_Video_Coding</a>
